title: [BUG] SkiaSharp.View.Uno.WinUI incompatible with other NativeReference (here storj_uplink)
body:
**Description**
I'm developing a Uno-App that uses the Storj-network with an open source library called [uplink.NET](https://github.com/TopperDEL/uplink.net), that needs a specific binary: storj_uplink.framework. If I have both nugets Skiasharp.Views.Uno.WinUI and [uplink.NET.iOs](https://www.nuget.org/packages/uplink.NET.iOS/) in a Mobile-project, I get the following error:

``
1>C:\Users\Toppe\.nuget\packages\skiasharp.nativeassets.ios\2.88.1-preview.63\buildTransitive\net6.0-ios13.6\SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.iOS.targets(6,9): error MSB4096: Das Element "C:\Users\Toppe\.nuget\packages\uplink.net.ios\2.9.2659\build\net6.0-ios\storj_uplink.framework" in der Elementliste "NativeReference" definiert keinen Wert für die Metadaten "FrameworkFilename".  Wenn Sie diese Metadaten verwenden möchten, qualifizieren Sie sie, indem Sie %(NativeReference.FrameworkFilename) angeben, oder vergewissern Sie sich, dass alle Elemente in der Liste einen Wert für diese Metadaten definieren.``

It basically says, that the storj_uplink.framework within the ElementList "NativeReference" does not include the Metadata-element "FrameworkFilename". The error points to the Skiasharp.NativeAssets.iOs.targets-file. If I understand correctly it verifies the native assets from Skiasharp to have a certain naming pattern. But that should not check other native assets, I think. At least I'm not sure how I can overcome this issue.

The storj_uplink.framework can be found [here](https://github.com/TopperDEL/uplink.net/tree/master/nuspec/xamarinios).

<!-- a general description goes here -->

**Code**

<!-- a snippet of code that demonstrates the issue -->

**Expected Behavior**
I can use both Nugets together without issues.

<!-- a general description of what was the expected behavior or result -->

**Actual Behavior**
The SkiaSharp-packages cannot work with the uplink.NET-package.
<!-- a general description of what really happened -->

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.88.1-preview.63
- IDE:  Visual Studio
- Platform Target Frameworks: 
  - iOS:  latest
